data.name: Fill and Cross Trick or Treat 3
data.detailed_description:
Fill and Cross. Trick or Treat 3 is a sequel to our series of logic puzzles with a happy Halloween atmosphere. A young couple has decided to see go trick-or-treating and see who can collect more candy. But will it all go smoothly?! After all, the most terrifying nightmares can come alive on this night…
Want to put your nerves to the test?! Get away from the daily grind?! Trick or Treat 3 is just what you need!

120 unique nonogram puzzles in 6 varied locations. Journey through a country of happy nightmares with relaxing music and beautiful premium-quality graphics.

New and improved controls! You won’t have to guess a solution again – the gameplay is built on logic alone! Improved, clear tutorial: choose a training level depending on your play skills. Complete only the training that you really need.

Develop your intellectual potential! The game is a great way to immerse yourself in a traditional Halloween atmosphere and is suitable for everyone who loves original Japanese puzzles set in interesting locations. What could be a better addition to a happy holiday for a fan of Japanese crosswords?

Enjoy a happy Halloween atmosphere with classical griddlers gameplay!

A Griddlers game
120 unique levels and 6 locations
Gameplay built on logic alone with no need for guessing
More than 12 hours of gameplay with relaxing music
New and improved tutorial, 3 help sections
Choose a training level based on your skills and complete one of 2 tutorial parts you really need
Special tasks and more than 15 colorful trophies
Colorful high-quality graphics helps you to sample the atmosphere of Halloween!

data.short_description: Trick or treat? 120 terribly exciting nonograms in Fill and Cross. Trick or Treat 3! Visit a haunted house!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 x64
  • Processor: 1500 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2000 MHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
